name: Soulmate
lyrics:
[Intro: Arijit Singh]

name: Agar Ho Tum
lyrics:
Agar ho tum toh
 Main khud ko bhula doon,
 Tere khwaabon, khayaalon mein,
 Yun hi main behta rahoon...
 Agar ho tum toh
 Hai phir kehna kya,
 Tere vaadon, iraadon mein yun hi
 Main uddhta rahoon...
 Zamaane bhar ki khushiyon ko,
 Tere daaman mein bhar doonga,
 Tu maange ek sitaara
 Chaand main tere haath mein rakh doonga!
 Agar ho tum,
 Toh darrna kya haan,
 Hai tera, hai mera,
 Humara ye saara jahaan...
 Agar ho tum,
 Toh saath khuda haan,
 Hai tera, hai mera,
 Humara ye saara jahaan...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Kitne siyaane dekhe,
 Kitne deewaane dekhe,
 Dil ke thhikaanon mein-
 Haan, tumsa nahin dekha...
 Dil ke fasaanon mein,
 Sohni mahiwaalon mein,
 Dil ne jahaan dekha-
 Tumsa nahin dekha!
 Zamaane bhar ki mohabbat ko,
 Haan tere naam main kar doonga,
 Tu keh de ek dafa toh
 Baahon mein tuhe aaj main bhar loonga!
 Agar ho tum,
 Toh darrna kya haan,
 Hai tera, hai mera,
 Humara ye saara jahaan...
 Agar ho tum,
 Toh saath khuda haan,
 Hai tera, hai mera,
 Humara ye saara jahaan...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Apna pata na paaoon,
 Jaanoon na kahan main jaaoon,
 Ek tere bin o maahi-
 Mera aur kya haan...
 Nainon mein tujh ko bhar loon,
 Khud ko main qaabil kar loon,
 Ek tere bin o maahi-
 Mera aur kya...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...
 Agar ho tum...

name: Ullu Ka Pattha
lyrics:
uloole-uloole...
jaana naa ho jahaan wahin jaata hai
dil ullu ka pattha hai
phooti taqdeer kyun aazmaata hai
dil ullu ka pattha hai
jaana naa ho jahaan wahin jaata hai
dil ullu ka pattha hai
phooti taqdeer kyun aazmaata hai
dil ullu ka pattha hai
be-sar-pair* ki hain iski aadatein
aafat ko jaan ke deta hai daavatein, e-ein
jaise aata hai-chutki-mein jaata hai
dil sau-sau ka chhuttaa hai...
jaana nahi ho wahin jaata hai
dil ullu ka pattha hai
confuse hai...
dosti pe isey aitbaar... aadha hai
rang mein jo dosti ke bhang ghol de,
ishq ka bhoot sar pe sawaar aadha hai.
nigal sake nahi ugal sake...
sangmarmar ka bangla banaata hai
dil akbar ka potaa hai
jaana nahi ho wahin jaata hai
dil ullu ka pattha hai.
uloole-uloole...

name: O Rey Chhori
lyrics:
